Body: Description: Would it be possible to exclude some computer accounts from this detection rule? We added some computer names in the section of the PingCastle.exe.config file however there are still counted in the S-OS-2008 rule.

Next Steps Updated: Customer will try what we recommended.
Adding the distinguishedName to the Honeypot setting in the pingcastle.exe config file.

Next Steps Updated: Customer will try what we recommended.
Adding the SAMAccountName AND distinguishedName tags to the Honeypot setting in the pingcastle.exe config file.
